page.title: 03Local and National News.
page.content: copies for distribution. A group of volunteers staple up the letters and work to deliver them in each street in Craven Arms.Most of the volunteers are Church members.The Newsletter is free and costs about 3 pence per copy to produce. STOP PRESS HEADLINES JUNE 6 1985. Newsletter - Thank you for a garage full of blankets to give warmth to refugees in Sudan and Ethiopia. Ludlow Advertiser - A successful coffee morning held at St.Christopher's Hall raised 156 pounds for the handicapped in Shrewsbury. Shropshire Star - Stiperstones arson attack.Gipsies leave town as police stand by.Terror attack by bees. Daily Mirror - Anger over Head's death trip refund. The Sun - Elton fights for song cash.
